00023 Camera::Camera() {
00024     //Set up defaults
00025     eyePosition = Point3(0,0,1);
00026     lookAtPosition = Point3(0,0,0);
00027     upDirection = Point3(1,0,0);
00028 
00029     frustum[0] = -1;
00030     frustum[1] = 1;
00031     frustum[2] = -1;
00032     frustum[3] = 1;
00033     frustum[4] = 2;
00034     frustum[5] = 100;
00035 
00036     path = NULL;
00037     character = NULL;
00038 
00039     angleLeftFunct = angleUpFunct = NULL;
00040 }

00056 Camera::Camera(Point3 pos, Point3 lookAt, Point3 up) {
00057     eyePosition = pos;
00058     lookAtPosition = lookAt;
00059     upDirection = up;
00060 
00061     //Set up default frustum style
00062     frustum[0] = -1;
00063     frustum[1] = 1;
00064     frustum[2] = -1;
00065     frustum[3] = 1;
00066     frustum[4] = 2;
00067     frustum[5] = 100;
00068

00070     character = NULL;
00071 
00072     angleLeftFunct = angleUpFunct = NULL;
00073 }

00142 void Camera::setFrustum(GLdouble left, GLdouble right, GLdouble bottom, GLdouble top, GLdouble zNear, GLdouble zFar) {
00143     frustum[0] = left;
00144     frustum[1] = right;
00145     frustum[2] = bottom;
00146     frustum[3] = top;
00147     frustum[4] = zNear;
00148     frustum[5] = zFar;

00155 void Camera::update() {
00156     if (character != NULL) {
00163         character->setPosition(eyePosition, lookAtPosition);
00164     } else if (path != NULL) {
00165         eyePosition = path->getPoint();
00166     }
00167     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00168     glLoadIdentity();
00169     glFrustum(frustum[0], frustum[1], frustum[2], frustum[3], frustum[4], frustum[5]);
00170     gluLookAt(eyePosition.x, eyePosition.y, eyePosition.z, lookAtPosition.x, lookAtPosition.y, lookAtPosition.z, upDirection.x, upDirection.y, upDirection.z);
00171 
00172     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00173     glLoadIdentity();
00174 }
00175 
00176 /*******************Movement***********************
00177  * These next three functions handle a nice form of movement in which
00178  * the camera moves as though on the surface of a sphere centered at
00179  * the lookAtPosition.
00180  **************************************************/
00181 
00202 void Camera::spinRightAroundCenter(GLdouble angle) {
00203     double radius = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getMag();
00204 
00205     //Set up some basis vectors for the plane in which you want to move
00206     Point3 basisY = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getUnit();
00207     Point3 basisX = Point3::cross(basisY, upDirection).getUnit();
00208 
00209     //Rotate the basis vectors by angle, this is the vector to translate
00210     //to our final destination
00211     Point3 returnVector = basisX*cos((angle+90)*(PI/180.0)) + basisY*sin((angle+90)*(PI/180.0));
00212 
00213     //Translate to the final position
00214     eyePosition = lookAtPosition + returnVector.getUnit()*radius;
00215 }
00216 
00236 void Camera::spinUpAroundCenter(GLdouble angle) {
00237     double radius = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getMag();
00238 
00239     //Set up some basis vectors for the plane in which you want to move
00240     Point3 basisY = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getUnit();
00241     Point3 basisX = Point3::cross(basisY, upDirection).getUnit();
00242     Point3 basisZ = Point3::cross(basisX, basisY).getUnit();
00243 
00244     //Rotate the basis vectors by angle, this is the vector to translate
00245     //to our final destination
00246     Point3 returnVector = basisY*cos((angle)*(PI/180.0)) + basisZ*sin((angle)*(PI/180.0));
00247 
00248     //Adjust the upDirection
00249     upDirection = basisZ;
00250 
00251     //Translate to the final position
00252     eyePosition = lookAtPosition + returnVector.getUnit()*radius;
00253 }
00254 
00273 void Camera::spinViewAroundCenter(GLdouble angle) {
00274     //Set up some basis vectors for the plane in which you want to move
00275     Point3 basisY = (eyePosition - lookAtPosition).getUnit();
00276     Point3 basisX = Point3::cross(basisY, upDirection).getUnit();
00277     Point3 basisZ = Point3::cross(basisX, basisY).getUnit();
00278 
00279     //Adjust the upDirection
00280     upDirection = basisX*cos((90+angle)*(PI/180.0)) + basisZ*sin((90+angle)*(PI/180.0));
00281 }

00286 void Camera::followPath(Path<Point3> pathToFollow) {
00287     printf("Called Camera::followPath()\n");
00288     if (path != NULL) {
00289         delete path;
00290     }
00291     path = new Path<Point3>;
00292     (*path) = pathToFollow;
00293 }
00294 
00298 void Camera::unFollowPath() {
00299     if (path != NULL) {
00300         delete path;
00301     }
00302     path = NULL;
00303 }

00316 void Camera::zoomIn(GLdouble amount) {
00317     eyePosition = eyePosition * amount;
00318 }

00331 void Camera::shift(Point3 direction, GLdouble amount) {
00332     Point3 shift = direction.getUnit()*amount;
00333     eyePosition = eyePosition + shift;
00334     lookAtPosition = lookAtPosition + shift;
00335 }
